title: properties.metadata.properties.createdBy.description
Mailing Label: The name of the originator (user or system) of the data. This is informational only
column3: do not use in business logic!

title: properties.metadata.properties.createdOn.description
Mailing Label: The date and time when the entity instance was created

title: properties.metadata.properties.modifiedBy.description
Mailing Label: The name of the modifier (user or system) of the data. This is informational only
column3: do not use in business logic!

title: properties.metadata.properties.modifiedOn.description
Mailing Label: The date and time when the entity instance was last modified

title: properties.id.description
Mailing Label: A global identifier of a preformatted mailing label.

title: properties.label.description
column3: usable directly with mail pieces. The text lines are printed in the order given. Complete use may require the addition of postal automation information on the mail piece. The postalCountry element must be added as an additional line when the sender is in a different country than the recipient.
